reqs:
The title of this module is Creative Destruction Lab. Classes will be held in DLAM 005.
An application form is required for admission to this module. You will be registered in BAEN 580B by your graduate program office. Please visit the BAEN 580B website for more information: http://www.sauder.ubc.ca/Programs/RHL_Current_Students/Modules_-_1st_Years/BAEN_580B
